Sasuke manifests his humanoid Susanoo and fires arrows at his opponent, stunning them. Sasuke goes on to manifest his Complete Body Susanoo, and creates nine Chibaku Tensei satellites, which he sets on fire and makes crash down on his target.

== Trivia ==
* The Chibaku Tensei portion of this technique appears to be inspired by Sasuke's capture of the [[Tailed Beast]]s from [[Revolution|chapter 692]].

[[pl:Chibaku Tensei: Amaotoshi]]
